and i need to know the code to ::master and where to put it so thankss :D

item.title: 508 help plz
item.dc:creator: @Explote Explote
item.description:
@Explote wrote:

Actually, If you want all skills 99, use this:

[code]else if(cmd[0].equals(“master”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
p.skillLvl[0] = 99;
p.skillXP[0] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[1] = 99;
p.skillXP[1] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[2] = 99;
p.skillXP[2] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[3] = 99;
p.skillXP[3] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[4] = 99;
p.skillXP[4] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[5] = 99;
p.skillXP[5] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[6] = 99;
p.skillXP[6] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[7] = 99;
p.skillXP[7] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[8] = 99;
p.skillXP[8] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[9] = 99;
p.skillXP[9] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[10] = 99;
p.skillXP[10] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[11] = 99;
p.skillXP[11] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[12] = 99;
p.skillXP[12] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[13] = 99;
p.skillXP[13] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[14] = 99;
p.skillXP[14] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[15] = 99;
p.skillXP[15] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[16] = 99;
p.skillXP[16] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[17] = 99;
p.skillXP[17] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[18] = 99;
p.skillXP[18] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[19] = 99;
p.skillXP[19] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[20] = 99;
p.skillXP[20] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[21] = 99;
p.skillXP[21] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[22] = 99;
p.skillXP[22] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[23] = 99;
p.skillXP[23] = 510000000;
p.skillLvl[24] = 99;
p.skillXP[24] = 510000000;

}[/code]

Or something like that, And for everybody to use it, just take out //p.rights = 2; save and compile

EDIT:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:4, topic:300521”][quote author=chef2470 link=topic=396785.msg2946795#msg2946795 date=1252259637]
im new
[/quote]

I’m not going to spoonfeed you, but, find a .java file thats named either login.java or rs2loginprotocol.java.

And then press CTRL + F and search for p.right

Should come up with like
p.rights = 3; or something, there should also be a list of names above that. Change one of those names to your ingame username.[/quote]

On 508 Servers Rights only go up to 2. 1 is mod, 2 is admin.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 help plz
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

chef2470:

can i make that for everybody thought, people that arent admin cant do it, i want people that arent admin be able too

Yeah. I think all you have to do is put the command a little higher in the file, NOT under something like:

if (p.rights >= 1) {

Do you have teamviewer? I could solve some of your problems or add some cool stuff.

item.title: 508 help plz
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

chef2470:

thank you do u know the masters code?

Yeah, 1 sec lemme find it.

EDIT:

		        if (cmd[0].equals("master")) {
				p.addSkillXP(13400000, 0);
				p.addSkillXP(13400000, 1);
				p.addSkillXP(13400000, 2);
				p.addSkillXP(13400000, 3);
				p.addSkillXP(13400000, 4);
				p.addSkillXP(13400000, 5);
				p.addSkillXP(13400000, 6);
			}

Put that under a command in “commands.java”.
